overview: Based on actual events, The Specimen is a comedic short film about a would-be father, a public restroom, and his intimate moment with a specimen cup. In this less than ideal backdrop, he has to battle his performance anxiety, overcome interruptions, and decide how far heâ€™s truly willing to go to become a dad.  This is going to be awkward.
tagline: This is going to be awkward.
title: The Specimen
